com.tim.yamba

Class StatusActivity.PostToTwitter

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.tim.yamba.StatusActivity.PostToTwitter
  • Enclosing class:
    StatusActivity

     class StatusActivity.PostToTwitter
extends
    Two method to deal with connecting
    • use the same thread (main thread) to connect
    • use asynchronous method
    Newer version prevents the first one, because it may seriously delay the main thread. Such that android provides android.os.AsyncTask
    note:
    • each generic type is for each method in this abstract class
    • The return object of doInBackground(String...) is passed to onPostExecute(String)
    • If we need to update something depending on what we have done, we use the method onProgressUpdate(Integer...) in doInBackground(String...) For example, we need to show status bar, or installation details
    Author:
    Tim
